title: The Laurel Review
additional-note: Volume 3, number 3 is the earliest issue we can find to have been registered for copyright in 1964.  Its copyright would have renewed automatically, as would copyrights of later issues with copyright notices.  We do not know the magazine's publishing schedule in the 1960s, so it is possible that earlier issues may also be under active copyright if they have a valid 1964 copyright notice.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
